alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 9:30AM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Trinidad Vicinity/Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Feet County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
